-  displayLink(target:selector:) 

Instance Method# displayLink(target:selector:)

macOS 14.0+

```
@MainActor
func displayLink(
    target: Any,
    selector: Selector
) -> CADisplayLink
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/displayLink(target:selector:)#see-also)

### [Accessing Window Information](/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/displayLink(target:selector:)#Accessing-Window-Information)

[`var depthLimit: NSWindow.Depth`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/depthlimit)The depth limit of the window.[`var hasDynamicDepthLimit: Bool`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/hasdynamicdepthlimit)A Boolean value that indicates whether the window’s depth limit can change to match the depth of the screen it’s on.[`class var defaultDepthLimit: NSWindow.Depth`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/defaultdepthlimit)Returns the default depth limit for instances of `NSWindow`.[`var windowNumber: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/windownumber)The window number of the window’s window device.[`class func windowNumbers(options: NSWindow.NumberListOptions) -> [NSNumber]?`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/windownumbers(options:))Returns the window numbers for all visible windows satisfying the specified options.[`var deviceDescription: [NSDeviceDescriptionKey : Any]`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/devicedescription)A dictionary containing information about the window’s resolution, such as color, depth, and so on.[`struct NSDeviceDescriptionKey`](/documentation/appkit/nsdevicedescriptionkey)These constants are the keys for device description dictionaries.[`var canBecomeVisibleWithoutLogin: Bool`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/canbecomevisiblewithoutlogin)A Boolean value that indicates whether the window can be displayed at the login window.[`var sharingType: NSWindow.SharingType`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/sharingtype-swift.property)A Boolean value that indicates the level of access other processes have to the window’s content.[`var backingType: NSWindow.BackingStoreType`](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/backingtype)The window’s backing store type.
